title: Hear Ariana Grande and Lizzo’s Remix of ‘Good as Hell’
text: Lizzo teased Thursday afternoon that another one of her biggest back-catalogue hits, “Good as Hell,” was getting the remix treatment. On Instagram, Lizzo teased her fans by holding up a Starbucks cup, grande size. “About something that’s dropping tonight, I’ll give you a hint: If you can guess the size of this drink,” she said, “you’ll know what I’m talking about.” Comedian Phoebe Robinson was one of the many stans who correctly guessed that Grande would be collaborating with Lizzo. Grande also hinted at the track by releasing a tiny snippet on her Instagram Story. Lizzo has really been benefitting from the anachronistic nature of the streaming-singles game. “Truth Hurts” perched at the top of the Billboard Hot 100 years after being released. “Good as Hell” is even older, originally appearing on the Barbershop: The Next Cut soundtrack. Better late than never to recognize a bop.
description: Ariana Grande and Lizzo hinted on Instagram that they would be collaborating on a remix of Lizzo’s single “Good as Hell.” The song originally appeared on the Barbershop: The Next Cut OST, starring Queen Latifah. “Truth Hurts” also got late love.
